Title: A Yurt of One's Own
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Davey Holmes, Dominique Morisseau (story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona tries to make amends with Sean, who isn't giving her the time of day. Meanwhile, Debbie and Queenie travel to a rural commune along with Frank who is trying to escape G-Dogg - who's after him for stealing his drugs.
